Class QuestionDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.chmut.giftit.dao.impl.QuestionDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dao<java.lang.Long,Question>, QuestionDao

    public class QuestionDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements QuestionDao
    The Question dao class provides manipulation of Question entity with database.
    Author:
    Sergei Chmut.
